name: ftlabs-screens-carousel
description: Takes a carousel url and fires events when the carousel url changes

scripts.deploy: git diff --quiet HEAD && PKG_VERSION=`npm version --no-git-tag-version ${1-'patch'} | cut -c 2-`; cd build/; npm version --no-git-tag-version $PKG_VERSION; cd -; git commit -am v$PKG_VERSION; git-directory-deploy --directory build --branch production; git checkout production; git tag v$PKG_VERSION; git push --tags; git checkout -
